L.description: Tricky scientific reasoning - boiling point at altitude
L.input_text: Water boils at 100°C at sea level. This city is 3000 meters above sea level. Higher altitude lowers atmospheric pressure. Lower pressure reduces the boiling point. Therefore, water boils at 100°C in this city.
expected_segments: Water boils at 100°C at sea level.
This city is 3000 meters above sea level.
Lower pressure reduces the boiling point.
